page.title: 12BIOGRAPHY AND BUILDINGS
page.content:
Captain James Cook was the most important person with whom Great Ayton has been associated, but her connection with the sea continues as Richard Crosthwaite, owner of Tees Towing, lives in Langbaurgh Hall. Another well-known local name is Winterschladen, an expatriate German, whose name is now given to a series of "wine shops".
Grange Mill has been adapted as a house from a very old water mill. The oldest building in the village is All Saints Church and Cliff Richard, the pop singer, visited it recently. The Grange and Ayton Hall are also old residences, and the latter is now a successful hotel gaining 75% in the 1985 Egon Ronay Lucas Guide.
